Openings


*Note: We are looking for passionate new Postdocs and Graduate students to join the team

  • We are welcome applicants with neuroscience or engineering or computational backgrounds. You will have the chance to work on the grand challenges of neuroscience using in-vivo neural activity recording (e.g. large-scale electrophysiology, fiber photometry, imaging), neural manipulation (e.g. optogenetics, chemogenetics, pharmacological techniques), analyzing the data (e.g. LFP, spike, machine learning), and new tools development. Please inquire at: klee@dgist.ac.kr


Applications for Postdoc positions:

  • Interested applicants should send a Cover letter, curriculum vitae with contact information for three references to the Principal Investigaton, Dr. Kwang Lee.


Applications for Graduate Students:

  • If you are interested in working with us as a Graduate student, please send me a state briefly what you are interested and attach a CV, including information about the classes and grades you had as an undergraduate. Please insert _"Application Graduate Student"_ in the subject line.
  • Take a look at the Graduate program and Presidential Fellowship.


Applications for Undergraduate Students

  • After contacting with Dr. Kwang, apply Open Lab and Intern program.
